channel.title: Updating
channel.description: I'm curious about what methods everyone is using for updating these days. In addition to ARGA, I know several other people have their own pet projects which presumably have updaters. If you wouldn't mind sharing how they work, I'm curious...

item.title: Updating
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

I’m against bytecode regexing due to it’s mad inefficiencies, and how easily an obfuscater can break the patterns. Imagine how we make passes over a deob to see the context of fields etc when we refactor, I have my updater pass over the byte code as such. It just finds the logical answer, not necessarily the correct one.

Read full topic
